content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. I'd be happy to help you with your plumbing needs. May I have your name, please?
Why do you need my name? Just send someone out, my sink is leaking.
I understand, and I'm here to get your service scheduled as quickly as possible. To dispatch a technician to your address, may I please have your name? This helps us keep our records accurate.
Just list me as 'customer.' I don't want to give my name.
Thank you for letting me know. I'll proceed without your name. May I please have the address where you need the plumbing service?
